entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 13.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 10:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 13 with temperature falling to 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then rain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 13 with temperature falling to 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming east 30 after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
